attributes.action: Stop bullying. Make local authorities (police, schools etc) take stand!!
attributes.background: Due to personal reason i stand behind this to many young people are left suffering from depression and other mental health problems. Not enough is done by local authorities anymore cause they dont want the paper work.

rejection.details:
We understand that you're concerned about authorities bullying, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could ask the Government to fund more staff and attention towards bulling prevention, if that's what you would like to happen.

You could also sign this petition to require the impact of bullying to be taught in schools if that is something you would like to see happen:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/228721
